body.name: BuTure Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 500W 38Kpa Stick Vacuum with Wall-Mounted Charging Dock Station, Touch Display, 55min Detachable Battery, 1.5L Dust Cup, Vacuum Cleaners for Pet Hair/Carpet/Hard Floor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 23 hrs 22 mins
features: ➤【Upgraded Wall-mounted Charging Dock Station】Are you still worried that forgetting to charge the vacuum cleaners in time? Upgraded JR700 Pro vacuum helps you solve this problem! Equipped with a wall-mounted charging dock station, you just place the vacuum on the bracket and it will charge automatically. No more worries about forgetting to charge. NOTE: You have to connect the original charger to this dock Assembly.

➤【 500W/38Kpa Strong Suction 】JR700 Pro cordless vacuum cleaner has an upgraded powerful 500W motor, providing a longer lifespan and lower noise for the vacuum cleaner. Easily and effectively removes dirt, debris, pet hair and etc.providing deep cleaning for your home. Besides, with an telescopic extension tube to adjust the length easily, JR700 Pro is suitable for people of different heights.

➤【55Mins Runtime & Multi Filtration】It's enjoyable to clean your whole-home in one go with this lightweight vacuum cleaner. Upgraded 55Mins battery in Min suction mode meets your daily cleaning needs, while advanced multi-layer filtration effectively captures 99.9% of tiny dust particles, and discharges clean air after purification. The 1.5L large dust cup can be easily emptied with the push of a button.

➤【Color Touch Screen】BuTure JR700 Pro wireless vacuum cleaner adjusts easily switch suction mode by touch the color display screen. The display screen of the vacuum cleaner also shows remaining battery life and alerts you when the vacuum is clogged, offering all of your familys a smarter cleaning experience.

➤【Universal Tangle-free Floor Brush with LED Lights】BuTure JR700 Pro vacuum cleaners cordless is equipped with the most advanced tangle-free floor brush, soft/hard bristles are built in, no need to replace the brush head when cleaning the floor/carpet. The floor brush comes with 4 LED lights for easy cleaning even in the dark.

➤【 Versatile Accessories】In the package, vacuum is alos equipped with accessories such as round brush, crevice brush, cleaning brush and 2 spare filters to meet the different cleaning needs. In addition, according to the requirement of most customers, we also provide separate hose for this vacuum (not included in the package and must be purchased separately in the store).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2024 Latest 500W 38Kpa Cordless Vacuum with Wall-Mounted Charging Dock Station
Previous page Next page 1 Touch Display 2 Multi-Filtration 3 55Mins Runtime

500W Powerful Brushless Motor Equipped with upgraded 500W motor, JR700 Pro vacuum can achieve an unprecedented 38000Pa cyclonic suction power at up to 180,000 rpm, which can effortlessly remove dust, debris, pet hair and dirt from floors and carpets. Electric Floor Brushes With LED Lights The brush head of the vacuum cleaner can support 0° to 180° sideways and 0° to 90° up and down swivel steering. Bright LED lights can illuminate the corner, the hidden dust has nowhere to escape to achieve better cleaning.

Does the JR700 Pro blue vacuum cleaner have a wall-mounted charging function? Yes. Currently only JR700 Pro Blue has this function. Install the bracket and connect the original charger to the station, just place the vacuum on the bracket and it will charge automatically. How long is the battery life on this model? Can I get an extra battery? 1. Energy-saving mode 40-55 mins, MAX mode 15-20 mins.Battery life depends on the setting and surfaces, so it mightn‘t always be exactly what we list. 2. If you have a larger space to clean,search B0CNVMM3ZC to get a spare. What surface is the JR700 Pro blue vacuum cleaner suitable for cleaning？ Cordless vacuum cleaners are suitable for cleaning hard floors (ceramic tiles, wooden boards, marble surfaces etc), carpets, sofas, stairs, beds, crevices, cars, and for deep cleaning of dust, hair, pet hair, cat litter, dog food,and paper scraps etc What if I cannot install or use the vacuum cleaner normally？and How do I purchase original accessories? There is an email address on the manual, packaging box, and card. Please send your issue and order ID(17 digits on the order page) to this email, we will solve the problem for you ASAP. The original accessories you can buy in the BuTure store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight with in-Base Charging
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This well-made cordless vacuum is easy to assemble with its snap-on design. It feels balanced and comfortable to use, and the built-in LED light helps illuminate dark corners. The charging dock makes it convenient to charge without searching for the cord, and the digital battery level indicator keeps you informed. With a noise level of around 55dB in normal mode and mid 70dB in high power mode, it's relatively quiet for a vacuum. Emptying and cleaning the dust bin is easy - just rinse it with water after emptying. Suction power is good and included attachments help other house cleaning works. I do wish the base has a place to hold the small cleaning tool and offers optional USB charging for charge in the vehicle. Overall, this vacuum offers a convenient and user-friendly cleaning experience.I hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small powerful battery vacuum with corner attachments
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum is a very small compact handheld battery powered vacuum. It comes with attachments for corners, a floor brush, and a rotating head brush.You can use it as a standard vacuum, or take off the extensions and use it like a dust devil.The floor roller has LED lights, and it feels natural in my hand. You turn the roller with a slight turn of the wrist.Where this works best is on stairs. It is small enough to easily handle the tight corners.It is not as powerful as a plug in vacuum, but it works great for an rv or a boat. It lasts about 30 minutes on low, and much less on high power. Usually you only need low power for most cleaning jobs.Finally it has a nice wall mount you can store it on if you want.Overall it's a good little vacuum for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent lightweight, portable vaccum! A must for any household.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is an amazing vaccum! Its very lightweight and is the only thing we'll use on stairs from now on. No more heavy equipment and cords to deal with. It has three suction settings and the highest setting is very strong. The wall mount charger is easy to install (just two screws) and keeps the vaccum charged up so its ready to use whenever you need it. Very handy, great suction, easy to use and light weight. We love this thing!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First off, one of the coolest features is the charging dock. All you have to do is choose a spot near an outlet and thats all. Literally after every use, just hang it on the mount and it will be charged and ready to go for the next use. No more wondering if you have a charged battery or if you forgot to plug it in. I love it.We have a household with 4 animals/pets (2 dogs + 2 cats). This means A LOT of pet hair and anything/everything the dogs bring in from outside. This vacuum handles all of that with ease. Not only did it handle the ENTIRE floor of the house in one charge, I only had it on the medium power. My animals were afraid of the old vacuum, but this one is much quieter. For some reason they're more intrigued than afraid.You can easily switch power modes via the large touch screen near the handle. It tells you the modes as well as the remaining battery. The only time I stopped was to empty all the hair/dirt that it was picking up. That was convenient as well. It's as easy as pushing a button to flip the dirt bin, the dirt falls into the trash, close the lid, and continue vacuuming.Three of my favorite features:1. The on/off function. You can do all of this cleaning with ONE hand. Pull the trigger once to turn it on, and pull the trigger again for off.2. The LED lights on the vacuum are awesome. I didn't know how much hair/debris I was missing until these lights were BEAMING onto the floor. I can easily clean my house in the DARK. It's almost fun seeing all the areas you've missed before just because the area wasn't getting enough light.3. The adjustable height of the Vacuum. I am 6'4 and my wife is much shorter. I never liked hunching down with the older vacuum, and now that won't be an issue for either of us anymore.We're excited to beable to use the accesories to get into the harder the reach areas like the furniture and even in our vehicles.Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase. Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love all the vacuums from this brand. Great suction, love the light feature, and now has a build in charging plug right in the wall mount! Super convenient and high end. I have had higher priced Dyson vacuums in the past and these work equally good and battery lasts longer. Comes with attachments and 2 additional filters. I love the adjustable height button to reach different areas and let my kids help vacuum! Low, medium, high speeds are very easy to understand and to use! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum works great! The suction is good and it’s super easy to clean once you’ve finished. I actually dump twice since in the middle of doing the entire house because I have two cats and don’t want it all clogged up. The charge does last long enough to vacuum the whole house for me though (1400 sq. ft.), which is a nice feature. I usually vacuum three times per week and it’s been great having this for a couple of weeks. Love all the attachments and the wall mount. Haven’t put it up yet, but it’s on my list. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The BuTure Cordless Vacuum Cleaner impresses with its strong powerful suction, making cleaning a breeze. The smart color touch screen adds a modern touch, enhancing user convenience. The rechargeable wall mount ensures easy storage and accessibility. The floor carpet brush, equipped with LED lights and a durable roller, provides efficient cleaning without frequent replacements. With a generous 1.5L dust cup capacity and a sleek Black+Blue design, this vacuum combines performance and style for a satisfying cleaning experience.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exceptional Value and a Quality product
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the BuTure vacuum cleaner, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance and value for money. As someone who is meticulous about keeping a clean home, I have tried various vacuum cleaners over the years, and the Buture stands out as a remarkable choice in its price range.Design and Build Quality:The vacuum cleaner boasts a sleek and modern design, and its build quality is surprisingly robust for its price. The materials used are metal, feel durable, and the overall construction gives off a sense of reliability. The compact design makes storage a breeze, and the lightweight nature of the vacuum adds to its user-friendly appeal.Powerful Suction:One of the standout features of the ButTure is its powerful suction capability. It effortlessly picks up dirt, dust, and pet hair from various surfaces, including carpets, hardwood floors, and tiles. The adjustable suction settings allow for versatility, ensuring that delicate surfaces are treated with care while still delivering the power needed for deep cleaning.Efficient Filtration System:Equipped with a HEPA filtration system, the BuTure effectively captures and traps allergens, providing a cleaner and healthier environment. This feature is especially valuable for households with pets or individuals prone to allergies.Versatile Attachments:The vacuum comes with a set of versatile attachments that make it easy to clean hard-to-reach areas and different surfaces. The crevice tool and electric floor brush have proven to be indispensable for tackling various cleaning tasks around the house.Easy Maneuverability:Thanks to its swivel steering and smooth-gliding wheels, maneuvering the BuTure is a breeze. It effortlessly navigates around furniture and other obstacles, reducing the time and effort required for a thorough cleaning session.Large Dustbin Capacity:The generous dustbin capacity means less frequent emptying, allowing for more uninterrupted cleaning sessions. The transparent design of the dustbin also makes it easy to monitor when it's time for disposal.Noise Level:While not completely silent, the BuTure operates at a reasonable noise level. It's not overly disruptive, making it suitable for use during any time of the day without causing a disturbance.In conclusion, the BuTure is an outstanding vacuum cleaner that offers exceptional cleaning power and value for its mid range price tag. Its combination of powerful suction, efficient filtration, versatile attachments, and user-friendly design make it a top contender in its category. I highly recommend it to anyone in search of an affordable yet high-performing vacuum cleaner for their home.
Me arranco el coche a la primera y eso que la batería estaba sin nada de potencia .

reviews.reviewTitle: Great vacumn you can get from Amazon
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve used a few brand’s vacumn from Amazon and this vacumn is number 1. I purchased a vacumn from Buture last year and liked it a lot and this is my 2nd vacumn purchase from Buture and love it!!It is light weighted and got 3 suction levels and I love that bin is wider round shape as it is easier to dump the dirt out. It is a little smaller and lighter compare to my other vacuum so for me, love the size and the weight especially when I need to clean my whole house. Battery lasts long enough to clean my 3 bedroom home and suction is strong compare to my big size vacumn. Recommend 100% with the confidence if you are looking to purchase a cordless vacumn from Amazon.
